scripts.fetch-docs: git submodule update --init --recursive && git submodule foreach --recursive git fetch && git submodule foreach --recursive git checkout origin/main && mkdir -p ./azure-arc-jumpstart-app/public/docs && mkdir -p ./azure-arc-jumpstart-app/public/img && cp -a ../arc_jumpstart_docs/docs/** ./azure-arc-jumpstart-app/public/docs/ && cp -a ../arc_jumpstart_docs/img/** ./azure-arc-jumpstart-app/public/img/ && ls -lah ./azure-arc-jumpstart-app/public/docs && ls -lah ./azure-arc-jumpstart-app/public/img
